Description: Fragment of cloth, mainly undyed cotton now very worn and discoloured, decorated with scattered geometric motifs in coloured wool (red, yellow, dark blue and dark green) Towards the top of the fragment a bar made up of small blue lozenges; towards bottom a chequered bar, the solid squares made of vertical lines of the four colours of wool, below this a band of small crosses.
Acquisition name: Division of Finds: Egyptian Antiquities Organisation
